Little bit of Rakefile eye candy

In this commit adding Font Awesome, the iconic font and CSS toolkit support for better and faster icon loading. And also put some colors on Rakefile build task status using class String methods to avoid aditional gem dependency.

class String
	def black;          "\033[30m#{self}\033[0m" end
	def red;            "\033[31m#{self}\033[0m" end
	def green;          "\033[32m#{self}\033[0m" end
	def brown;          "\033[33m#{self}\033[0m" end
	def blue;           "\033[34m#{self}\033[0m" end
	def magenta;        "\033[35m#{self}\033[0m" end
	def cyan;           "\033[36m#{self}\033[0m" end
	def gray;           "\033[37m#{self}\033[0m" end
	def bg_black;       "\033[40m#{self}\033[0m" end
	def bg_red;         "\033[41m#{self}\033[0m" end
	def bg_green;       "\033[42m#{self}\033[0m" end
	def bg_brown;       "\033[43m#{self}\033[0m" end
	def bg_blue;        "\033[44m#{self}\033[0m" end
	def bg_magenta;     "\033[45m#{self}\033[0m" end
	def bg_cyan;        "\033[46m#{self}\033[0m" end
	def bg_gray;        "\033[47m#{self}\033[0m" end
	def bold;           "\033[1m#{self}\033[22m" end
	def reverse_color;  "\033[7m#{self}\033[27m" end
end

and usage:

puts "I'm back green".bg_green
puts "I'm red and back cyan".red.bg_cyan
puts "I'm bold and green and backround red".bold.green.bg_red

Source : colors - Colorized Ruby output - Stack Overflow
